alert.note: Alert for Forrest (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 24 at 3:28PM CDT until August 24 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is ongoing, * WHERE...A portion of southeast Mississippi, including the following counties, Forrest and Lamar. * WHEN...Until 630 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 327 PM CDT, the public and local officials reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is already occurring. Between 5 and 8 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hattiesburg, Petal, West Hattiesburg, Purvis, Lumberton, Sumrall, Mclaurin, Rock Hill, Pine Ridge, Oak Grove, Sunrise, Brooklyn, Rawls Springs, Macedonia and Maxie. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
